post.author: 신덕현

comment.author: 이인석
comment.content: 조금 심하다. 우리 도우미 아줌마들도 대접해 줍시다

comment.author: Sonia
comment.content: 조금이 아니라 많이 심한건 알겠는데, 도우미 아줌마???

post.content:
One day, while walking to the store, I passed by a nursing home. On the
front lawn were six old ladies lying naked on the grass. I thought this was
a bit unusual, but continued on my way to the store.

  On my return trip, I passed the same nursing home with the same six old
ladies lying naked on the lawn. This time my curiosity got the best of me
and I went inside to talk to the manager.

  "Do you know there are six ladies lying naked on your front lawn?"
"Yes," he said. "They're retired prostitutes, and they're having a yard
sale."
post.title: Retirement
